```{r}
devtools::load_all()
```

```{r}
mexp <- MidarExperiment()
mexp <- mexp |> 
  loadMasshunterCSV(, "Test_MH.csv") |> 
  loadMSOrganizerXLM(mexp, "MSTemplate_Creator_forTest.xlsm")

mexp <- mexp |> 
  normalizeByISTD(mexp) |> 
  quantitateByISTD(mexp) |> 
  calcQC(mexp)

mexp <- mexp |> SLIN

```

```{r}
SLINGtools::writeReportXLS(data = mexp, filename = here(".testing/MyReport"))
```
